title: No Season 8 Rewards
body:
So I decided to finally write this as I feel I got "bsed" by the system. I was banned the day of or the day after (can't remember exactly) for "intentional feeding in a game".

This game was on Twisted Treeline Ranked because I was going for Gold Rank in it for the Orianna Chroma.

In this game I played Ekko and in the entire game I went 0-3. Can't remember the exact KDA but I know for sure I was 0-3. I had a Miss Fortune who went like 0-9 the first 10 minutes of the game. For those who do play Twisted Treeline, it is very hard to make a comeback when you are behind as it is not like Summoner's Rift.

Anyway, I decided it was in my best interest, my team's, and the enemy team. Also the enemy team was questioning why we didn't ff or just open.

But I did open, I let the enemy team push and they were fine with that. But my teammates didn't like that and reported me and yet I got reported for it. I feel as if I get treated unfairly and the system just saw me get reported and just banned me cause it could. I really want my season 8 rewards as I achieved Gold in all ranked queues and caused I got banned, I don't get anything.

Can anyone help me please.

replies.body:
Opening a lane to hasten your team's loss is a gameplay infraction. The reform card calls all forms of trolling "Int feeding", but that is just a label.

A 14 day punishment is correct for opening a lane.

If you want to forfeit, use the /ff vote. If the vote fails, keep doing your best to win. Call the vote every time it's off cooldown.
You don't get to decide to leave a game just because a surrender doesn't pass.
Your best bet is to contact Rito support via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

That doesn't apply to anyone who got banned, only for those who were chat restricted.

Though if OP did receive the ban after the end of the season, they should still have received ranked rewards. Hard to tell when exactly the ban was received, though. The end of the season was November 12th, and the last game the OP played before they received the ban was on November 12th. Clearly, it was either just before or just after the end of the season.

are honor rewards stripped from banned B O Is?

Not everyone received the ranked rewards immediately upon the end of the season. I remember seeing at least several threads from people who didn't receive them and thought there was a mistake, but received them within a few days of the end of the season.

And as far as I can tell, no, bans do not strip ranked rewards. Players that received a ban simply have not been given the opportunity to get their honor back to level 2 before Feb. 11th like those who were only chat restricted were.

I know damn well how hard a Twisted Treeline can snowball, and I've been on both sides of that plenty of times.

Doesn't mean you get to decide for the other two players on your team that the game is lost, however.

Though if you did receive the ban after the end of the season, contact support. You should still receive season rewards if that were the case. If you're not sure, contact support and ask when the ban was issued.
